targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
sum("Cases"."cases") AS "Infektionsfälle", 
sum("Cases"."recovered") AS "Genesene", 
sum("Cases"."dead") AS "Todesfälle", 
((SELECT sum("Cases"."cases") FROM "Cases" WHERE "countyID" IN (SELECT "id" FROM "Counties" WHERE "state" = $numberboxes))::decimal/
(SELECT sum("Cases"."cases") FROM "Cases" WHERE "countyID" IN (SELECT "id" FROM "Counties" WHERE "state" = $numberboxes) AND "date" < now()-interval'1 week')::decimal) AS "R-Wert" FROM "Cases" 
WHERE "countyID" IN (SELECT "id" FROM "Counties" WHERE "state" = $numberboxes)
